name: Github Plugin

descriptions.en_US: A plugin to monitor GitHub pull requests, CI status, and your contributions graph. Configure your access token and repository to get started. View open PRs, their status, and recent activity with periodic refresh.

short-descriptions.en_US: Show GitHub PRs, CI status & contributions.

description: A plugin to monitor GitHub pull requests, CI status, and your contributions graph. Configure your access token and repository to get started. View open PRs, their status, and recent activity with periodic refresh.
short-description: Show GitHub PRs, CI status & contributions.
